projects.name: Iris classification
projects.description: Iris classification uses the Iris dataset, which contains measurements of sepal length, sepal width, petal length, and petal width for 150 iris flowers, to classify them into three species: Iris-setosa, Iris-versicolor, and Iris-virginica.

projects.name: Wine quality prediction
projects.description: Wine quality prediction uses machine learning to assess wine characteristics (e.g., acidity, sugar content) to predict its quality. Tools like Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, and visualization libraries (e.g., Matplotlib, Seaborn) are used for data preprocessing, exploratory data analysis, model training, and evaluation.

projects.name: Music playlist
projects.description: A music playlist might include relaxing Chill Vibes, energetic Workout Hits, feel-good Road Trip Mix, instrumental Study Focus tunes, high-energy Party Anthems, nostalgic Throwback Classics, fresh Indie Discoveries, soft Romantic Tunes, uplifting Morning Motivation, and soothing Sleep Sounds.
